//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float2 LightFunctionParameters;
//   float4 MinZ_MaxZRatio;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4x4 ScreenToLight;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   UniformPixelVector_0    c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio          c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled         c3       1
//   ScreenToLight           c7       4
//   LightFunctionParameters c11      1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0        s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.5, -0.5, 1, 0
    def c6, 0.333000004, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-lights --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_F0BE944F_34907078.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r31, c220.z, s15
mov r3.xyw, v0
add r31.w, r3.w, -r31.y
mad r3.x, r31.w, r31.x, r3.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r3.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r3.x
      mov r1.yz, r3.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r3.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r3.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r3.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1.xyz, r0.z, c8.xyww

// Unreal Engine light fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-lights --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_F0BE944F_34907078.txt
add r31.w, r0.x, -r31.y
mad r0.y, -r31.w, r31.x, r0.y

    mad r0.yzw, c7.xxyw, r0.y, r1.xxyz
    mad r0.xyz, c9.xyww, r0.x, r0.yzww
    add r0.xyz, r0, c10.xyww
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mad r0, r0.xyxy, r0.z, c5.xxyy
    texld r1, r0, s2
    add r2.xy, -r0, c5.z
    cmp r2.xy, r2, c5.z, c5.w
    cmp r0.zw, r0, r2.xyxy, c5.z
    mul r0.z, r0.w, r0.z
    mul r1.xyz, r1, r0.z
    cmp r1.xyz, -r0.y, c4.y, r1
    cmp r0.yzw, r0.y, r1.xxyz, c4.y
    cmp r0.yzw, -r0.x, c4.y, r0
    cmp r0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww, c4.y
    add_pp r0.xyz, r0, c0
    dp3 r0.w, r0, c6.x
    lrp_pp r1.xyz, c11.x, r0.w, r0
    add r0.xyz, r1, -c5.z
    mov r1.z, c5.z
    mad_pp r0.xyz, c11.y, r0, r1.z
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    rsq_pp r0.y, r0.y
    rsq_pp r0.z, r0.z
    rcp_pp oC0.x, r0.x
    rcp_pp oC0.y, r0.y
    rcp_pp oC0.z, r0.z
    mov_pp oC0.w, c5.z

// approximately 55 instruction slots used (4 texture, 51 arithmetic)
